desc:
This is initial OnTime Accelerators release. Script provides helpers that make work with OnTime quicker and much optimal.

Features:

  1. Quick project lookup
    ​​This feature allows to quickly find the particular project. Script injects a few additional buttons near the Project field. [view]
     
  2. Assign to me
    ​    Script adds the "to me" button near the Assigned To: field. Click on that button selects your name in the field. [view]
     
  3. Create related issue button
    Scripts extends the Related Items section and injects the "Add related issue" button. 
    ​This button is an alias for the More -> Add -> Issue -> Add Issue that is related to selected item option. [view]

Scripts were significantly improved and extended in this version. The internal architecture was reworked to better fit further scalatibility.
Now there is a nice settings dialog that allows to enable/disable particular features, tweak feature-specific settings, etc.

Release highlights:

  • +15 new features (18 total).
  • All features became disabled by default.
  • Relocated to the BitBucket, so require script re-installation.
  • Logic of the script was significantly improved.

New features (major ones only):

  • Ability to relate existing tickets directly by ID.
  • The To L2 button fires the worklog dialog.
  • Notify & Save & Close button was added.
  • Window unload hook was added during the editing that prevents you from accidental page reload.
  • Button to query versions for all the related tickets (useful when you look for a workaround for particular Sitecore version).
  • You can add yourself to the notifications list by a single click.
  • Added Download Manager for attachments. This mini-application allows to more conveniently work with attachments, download only recent ones etc.
  • Ability to download multiple attachments as a single file (useful when you have a lot of attachments).
  • When you register a new issue (bug), you can fill the Found In field by a version from currently selected ticket.

Minor changes:

  • [Notify Me helpers] Added ability to configure the Add me to notifications button's label.

Major changes:

  • Greasemonkey/Tampermokey storage now is used for client settings. Browser caches cleanup will not lead to the settings lost more.
  • Added feature to Backup/Restore client settings. Related dialog is invoked from the settings dialog: [view].

Minor changes:

  • Added feature to support dynamic values (i.e. you are prompted) for Quick Multi-Edit actions feature.
  • Added Attach button to the Download Manager, allowing to attach new files when you're viewing attachments.
  • Added Reload button the Download Manager dialog.
  • Allow to fix broken JSON in configuration after save attempt.

Minor changes:

  • [Project Helper] Added the Showstoppers option to the projects picker.

In this release the capabilities of the Download Manager were significantly improved, so it was renamed to Attachments Manager.


New features:

  • Added feature to disable the Drag&Drop functionality for tickets grid.
  • Added customer info links to ticket preview dialog. Links are added near the Customer and Licensee fields: [view].

New functionality:

  • Attachments Manager now allows to edit description for attachments and delete them: [view].
  • Attachments Manager could be invoked from ticket edit dialog: [view].
    To enable button, refer to the Enhanced attachments downloading feature configuration (the Add shortcut button to ticket edit dialog setting).
  • The Attach button now works for non-portal (standalone) ticket editing as well.

Bugs fixed:

  • [Attachments Manager] Previous preview image could appear until new one is loaded.

Bugs fixed:

  • [Customer info shortcut] Link might not work if customer name contains special characters.

This release contains major improvements for the Create new issue button (the Create related issue button feature):

  • When you create a new related issue, now project is automatically set to CMS Inbox.
  • You can use Ctrl + Left click on the button to select the relation type for new issue (before the related to relation was used only): [view].
    Depending on the relation type, the default project will be set accordingly.

Tech Review related enhancements:

  • Title is filled automatically for new reviews.
  • You can configure review project ID, so it will be selected automatically
    Refer to the Tech Review project ID setting for the Create related issue button feature. Use setting's hint for predefined values. 

DEMO: [view] (Ctrl + Left click was used).


Other:

  • [Project Helper] Added Problem Management Pool to predefined projects list.

Minor changes:

  • [Create related issue button] Fixed feature's description in settings to reflect recent changes.

New features:

  • [Release Notes] Now release notes are embedded into the script itself. Settings button notifies about new version of script as soon as it's updated.
  • [Get full project path] Feature allows to resolve full path for current ticket on label click: [view].

Improvements:

  • [Project Helper] Now button is visible for existing tickets as well, allowing to move them (e.g. to Outbox folder). However, there are confirmations for non-new tickets as a protection from accidental relocation.
  • [Customer Info shortcut] Added setting to make link from the Customer and Licensee field values, without additional button nearby.
  • [Quickly set to final workflow state] Added ability to perform Ctrl + Notify & Save & Close to automatically set ticket to Updated state and notify customer.

Miscellaneous:

  • [Project Helper] Added the CMS Archive and [V6 Modules]Archive to list of predefined options.
  • Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

New features:

  • ['Related TFS Items' tab enhancements] Feature adds the TFS relations tab to the standalone item preview mode.
    ​Also, feature dynamically updates the "content present" blue mark for the tab [view].
    ​
  • [RTE usability tweaks] Feature adds a couple of sub-features to the RTE field editor [view]:
    • Capture scroll (Chrome only): when cursor is over the RTE field, field content is scrolled only (page is fixed).
    • Hotkeys: insert HTML snippet or execute custom function on custom hotkey.
      ​
       
  • Experimental [Duplicate fields in preview] Feature allows to duplicate particular fields in ticket preview grid [view].

 

Improvements:

  • [Quick Multi-Edit actions] Feature was almost totally rewritten. Main highlights:
    • 'Archive IR' button was added to quickly move IR/BC to the Archive project;
    • support for custom value prompt;
    • now you can specify labels for options prompt;
    • support series update logic (e.g. workflow option is available only after the Project field is changed).

    Note! Descriptor syntax was changed a bit. Review your custom descriptors to ensure that they meet new syntax.
    ​
  • Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Highlights:

This is a major release. Script was heavily refactored to provide better performance and clearer internal structure.
​Script sources has been opened (GitHub), so now you have access to the bug tracker.

 

New features:

  • [Settings dialog] Settings dialog was rewritten from scratch to better cover number of features.
    ​Improvements:
    • Tabbed UI introduced for better navigation.
    • Added Reset to default feature to quickly reset particular setting to its default value.
    • Added settings and features groupping.
    • Added immediate validation of the entered setting value (e.g. for int​ or JSON settings).
    • Embedded JSON editor for advanced setting editing.
      ​
  • [Collapse old replies] Feature allows to hide previous customer replies and show the latest ones only: [view].
  • [Related Items Manager] Feature adds dialog to see and manage related items. Dialog could be called during ticket edit: [view]
  • ['Query related item information' button] Feature was rewritten from scratch. Now it fetches more information and looks better: [view].
  • ['Open ticket view' button] Added button to quickly preview ticket from the Edit mode: [view].
  • [Defects grid: column value decorator] Feature allows to replace column values for grid. By default TicketId and Customer Response Date columns are decorated: [view].
  • [Defects grid: minor tweaks] Feature allows to disable horizontal scroolbar for the portal grid.

 

Fixes and enhancements:

  • [Customer info link] Now customer information link is rendered for the edit mode as well.
  • [Related TFS Items' tab enhancements] Fixed broken styles and links for grid content in particular scenarios (e.g. for standalone view).
  • [Attachment tools] Attachments Manager dialog button was renamed to Attachments Manager.
  • ['View related issue' button] Now copying (right click on the View button) is silent, without prompt.
  • [Duplicate fields in preview] Feature doesn't contain predefined rules more.

 

Internal enhancements:

  • All feature definitions were aligned to the same guideline, so now it's easier to support them.
  • Script was minified using the UglifyJS minifier.
  • SASS is now used to define script styles.
  • Settings and Relation Manager dialogs were built using the Knockout JS library.

Bugs fixed:

  • [Query related info, Related Items Manager] Error is thrown if data cannot be read for customer [#69].
  • [Related Items Manager] Related Items button is not immediately available after you save a new issue [#71].
  • [Query related info] Unable to add new columns after you queried extended info [#73].
  • Long dash is shown as short (because of script minification) [#68, #70].

 

Enhancements:

  • [Attachment Tools] The Bundle All button was renamed to Bundle Selected [#67].
  • [Customer Info link] Changed button position in the ticket edit mode.
